name: Want a Hair Cut ?
description:
As a child, have you ever been afraid of a hairdresser?

Those days are not over yet!

While you are in the hair salon because you need a new haircut, you quickly realize that you are not safe here!

Hormos the serial killer disguised as a hairdresser intends to kill you like his last customers!

Find all 10 precious golden scissors and escape Hormos before you go down as the next victim in the hairdressing salon!

and escape Hormos the serial killer disguised as a hairdresser!

Good luck...
